fields.summary: [CHR2FB] Default LAN Lease time is not equal to 86400

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: [tr181-dslite][Nokia]Ethernet LAN devices can't reach the wan
[CHR2fA][DHCP] LAN and WiFi Clients are not getting IPv4 addresses and  IPv6 addresses After LAN Pool Change
[CHR2fA][DHCP] LAN and WiFi Clients are not getting IPv4 addresses and  IPv6 addresses After LAN Pool Change  :: PRPLC-12482

fields.Action: Plug a LAN PCs to 1, 3 and 4 physical RJ45 ports on the DUT and Check the LAN traces
fields.Expected Result:
The LAN PCs obtain a valid IP addresses from the DHCP Server with

the lease time of 86400sec (24h) 

the Standard options (i.e gateway address, netmask, domain name, DNS Server...).

fields.Action: Try to reach the WAN from the connected PCs (Ping, or internet browsing…)
fields.Expected Result: Regardless the used physical LAN port, the PCs have wan connectivity via the DUT.

fields.description:
The test aims to check the ability of the DHCP server to deliver valid leases and Wan connectivity to PCs connected on each Lan Ports.

[Precondition]

Wan connectivity is OK.

security.description: Only SoftAtHome people can access the issue
security.name: SAH
